title: 306. Q&AF: Fixing A Company's Morale, Establishing Yourself As A Leader & Fighting The School System's Wokeness
itunes:title: 306. Q&AF: Fixing A Company's Morale, Establishing Yourself As A Leader & Fighting The School System's Wokeness
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions about boosting your company's morale after a few months of being in a slump, what common mistakes people make trying to establish themselves as leaders in today's society, and if you should place your children into private schools or fight against the woke agenda being pushed into the school systems.
